resources.string: Images: (Menu to add, Click to remove)

Configure a blog above.

You can have more than one blog, one of which will be active at a time. The blog shown on this screen when you click "Save" will be the active blog.

New posts will always be sent to the active blog. The active blog can be changed from this screen at any time.

Blogs can be created and deleted from the Menu on this screen. This screen can be reached through the "Settings" menu item on the main screen.

PostBot has experienced an OutOfMemoryError.\n\nThis sometimes occurs when uploading a post with multiple images in it. A draft of the post you were editing has been saved - please exit and then try posting it again.
Remove all images from this post?\n\nThe images will be removed from the local draft immediately, and when you submit this post, they will be removed on the blog as well.
Remove image from this post?\n\nThe image will be removed from the local draft immediately, and when you submit this post, the image will be removed on the blog as well.
Click a post to edit it. Drafts are marked with [D]. Posts that have been changed since being posted are marked with [*].
